custom_capabilities.title: InvestigateDomainListThreatIntelligence
custom_capabilities.description: Investigate a list of domains by correlating them to the ThreatIntelligenceIndicator table in Sentinel.

parameters.name: domains
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of domains to be investigated. Each domain should be enclosed in single quotes.

custom_capabilities.kql_query: ThreatIntelligenceIndicator | where DomainName in ({{domains}}) | project Description, Action, ConfidenceScore, ThreatType, ThreatSeverity,Tags

custom_capabilities.title: InvestigateIPListThreatIntelligence
custom_capabilities.description: Investigate a list of IP addresses by correlating them to the ThreatIntelligenceIndicator table in Sentinel.

parameters.name: ipAddresses
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of IP addresses to be investigated. Each IP address should be enclosed in single quotes.

custom_capabilities.kql_query: ThreatIntelligenceIndicator | where NetworkSourceIP in ({{ipAddresses}}) | project Description, Action, ConfidenceScore, ThreatType, ThreatSeverity,Tags
